row.process:
:SET &UC4RB_DB_SCRIPT_SEPR# = ";" :SET &UC4RB_SQL_SEPARATOR# = "," :SET &UC4RB_SQL_PASSWORD# = "" :SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = "drop tablespace &UC4RB_DB_DROP_TABLESPACE#" :IF &UC4RB_DB_DROP_CONTENTS# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " including contents") :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DB_DROP_DATAFILES# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " and datafiles") :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DB_CASCADE_CNSTR# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " cascade constraints") :ENDIF :SET &UC4RB_SQL_DATABASENAME# = ""
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_DB.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_SQL_SCRIPT_FILE :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_DB.PRV.INCLUDE.EXECUTE_SQL_STATEMENT
